Package com.sadakatsu.clue.exception

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ClueException
    The ClueException class acts as a superclass for all the exceptions that can be generated by an AI failing to follow the contest rules.
    DisqualifiedPlayer
    The DisqualifiedPlayer exception is thrown by the Match class if any of the Players passed to it to play the game were disqualified before being passed in to the Match constructor.
    DuplicateIdentifier
    The DuplicateIdentifier exception is thrown when the EntryScript.process() method finds that AIs in the entry script have been assigned the same identifier.
    DuplicateSuggestion
    An Exception that represents that a Player (server-side) or AI (client-side) tried to make the same Suggestion more than once.
    IncorrectCategory
    An IncorrectCategory represents that the Suggestion class was passed the wrong type of Card in its constructor.
    InvalidDisprove
    The InvalidDisprove represents that a Player (server-side) or AI (client- side) tried to disprove a Suggestion with a Card that is not in the intersection between the Suggestion's Cards and the player's/AI's hand.
    InvalidPlayerCount
    An InvalidPlayerCount exception is thrown by the Match class if fewer than three or more than six Players are passed to participate in the game.
    InvalidSuggestionString
    An InvalidSuggestionString means that the String passed to the Suggestion(String) constructor was not of the format "Su We Ro".
    MissedAccusation
    The MissedAccusation exception means that a connected AI failed to repeat an undisproved Suggestion it made when it holds none of the Cards from the Suggestion in its Hand.
    ProtocolViolation
    A ProtocolViolation means that a server/AI received a message that does not match the contest's specified protocol.
    SuicidalAccusation
    The SuicidalAccusation exception means that an AI chose to make an accusation that used at least one Card that it has seen, either by having been dealt the Card or having been shown the Card when one of its Suggestions was disproved.
    TimeoutViolation
    The TimeoutViolation is a ClueException for disqualifying Players that take too long to respond to the server.
